name: Lightspeed
title: Utf8b8jbje4jw Moonpay Goes Shopping
text:
Synopsis
MoonPay's acquisition of Helio for $175M signals continued investor confidence in crypto payments infrastructure, despite the sector's current limited adoption.

Key Insights
- MoonPay acquired Solana payments startup Helio in an all-equity deal valued at $175 million
- The entire Helio team will join MoonPay, expanding the company's payments services capabilities
- Helio is known for its Shopify plugin that enables merchants to accept payments via the Solana network
- The acquisition represents a strategic move to expand beyond crypto buying/selling into providing payment infrastructure
- This deal follows Stripe's $1.1 billion acquisition of stablecoin infrastructure company Bridge in October
- In a recent Solana Founders poll, payments were identified as the most underrated sector for Solana
- Some industry experts view the MoonPay-Helio deal as internal consolidation rather than a major market validation
